name: Incandescent One
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, poisoned, prone, restrained

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Slam attacks or three Astral Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) bludgeoning damage + 18 (4d8) cold.

actions.name: Astral Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit, 120 ft., one target, 18 (4d6+4) radiant and the next attack roll made vs. the target before the end of the incandescent one's next turn has advantage.

bonus_actions.name: Celestial Inspiration
bonus_actions.desc: Inspires one creature it can see within 60' of it. Whenever target makes attack roll or save before start of incandescent one's next turn target can roll a d4 and add number rolled to the attack roll or save.

special_abilities.name: Aqueous Form
special_abilities.desc: Can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 foot wide with o squeezing.

special_abilities.name: Flyby
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

special_abilities.name: Immortal Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require food drink or sleep

special_abilities.name: Luminous
special_abilities.desc: Sheds dim light in a 5 ft. radius.
